content.text: Express the following in standard form:

hint.text:
\(0.005 = 5.0 \times 10^{-3} = 5 \times 10^{-3}\).
Here, the decimal point is shifted three places towards the right. Therefore, the exponent value of \(10\,\) is \(-3\)
\(500 = 5.00 \times 10^{2} = 5 \times 10^{2}\).
Here, the decimal point is shifted two places towards the left. Therefore, the exponent value of \(10\,\) is \(2\)
